DOC.brief_summary: The aim study first assess desflurane superior order achieve fast emergence anesthesia .
DOC.brief_title: Emergence Times Airway Reactions General Laryngeal Mask Airway Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study first assess desflurane superior order achieve fast emergence anesthesia ( state date birth ) second desflurane non-inferior occurrence airway complication compare sevoflurane total intravenous anesthesia propofol set laryngeal mask airway .
DOC.criteria: Planned anesthesia use LMA ( laryngeal mask airway ) Planned duration anesthesia 0.5 2 hour Age 1875 year Both gender Body mass index ( BMI ) < 35 ASA 13 Written inform consent prior study participation Planned additional regional local anesthesia Contraindication use laryngeal mask airway Asthma COPD IV Known allergy hypersensitivity drug administer study Women pregnant , breastfeed woman childbearing potential use adequate contraceptive method Participation drug device trial within previous 30 day . Patients legally unable give write informed consent . Patients severe psychiatric disorder Recent ( < 6 month ) history alcohol drug abuse Patients severe neuropsychiatric disorder Nonfluency German language
